page.title: 18COMMENTS ABOUT THE LOCALITY
page.content: Children's opinions of Golders Green: "It has big roads which are very dangerous." "We have very big litter problems in Golders Green. People think it is a dustbin. It is full of old cigarettes, cans, food and lots of rubbish." "There are plenty of old age homes and guest houses around the area." "There are plenty of accidents in Golders Green because people drive too fast and double park." "People like the name of Golders Green. It makes people want to live there because it sounds so glorious." "In Golders Green you cannot really go for a walk as there are few nice places." "Golders Green is mostly a Jewish community but still there are plenty of other people." by Children from Menorah School.
